extendedInfo.description: Add shortcuts to your notification bar like how you would add them to your home screen.Gain control of your notification bar now and make use of all that wasted space. Any shortcut that can be created on the home screen can also be created on the notification bar using Bar Shortcuts. Create shortcuts to launch applications, direct dial or sms numbers, music playlists, bookmarks, phone settings and more..Note that the application requests the Call Permission in order to create direct dialing shortcuts.Updates:v1.1----- Removed ads!- Folders have been added! Group your shortcuts together into folders that can be launched from the notification status bar.v1.1.1-------- Fixed a bug that was sometimes causing the application to crash on first time run after installation.v1.1.2------- Added an option to display the notification as "Notifications" rather than Ongoing. Access this through Menu-> Settings-> Notification Type. Note that due to a limitation in the way Android notifications work, choosing this will cause Ongoing Notifications from other applications to be pushed to the right. I highly recommend showing the notifications as Ongoing for a better experience.1.1.3-----Really fixed the bug that was causing the app to crash the first time it is run after installation1.1.4------ Added option to change the notification text color between white/black (Access by pressing Menu > Settings)- Fixed some very minor memory leaks1.1.5------ Added extra settings shortcut. Locate it under "All Settings" when choosing to add a shortcut type- Some minor bug fixes

reviews.title: Superb application
reviews.comment: Ultimate apk, must have apk. I also said this apk is in must have instock ROM. But two function add in this apk. (1) insert tile menu in status bar (2) insert long press option in shortcuts. Otherwise it I\'d perfect application for every Android phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must have app.
reviews.comment: 5 stars if d font size cud b edited nd it wud b better if there r different tabs.( like in htc phones)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sensation
reviews.comment: This\'s a wonderful soft,easy using and very useful. I love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!   But can be better if
reviews.comment: Can be better if there where: 1.option to add more than one shortcat in a row 2. Option to change font color 3. Option to hide text (show only icon)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app works perfectly!
reviews.comment: The only improvement I can think of would be the ability to customise the icons and text.  Running sense 3.5 on the HTC Desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs horizontal row
reviews.comment: It will be great if icons can be alligned horizontally. Otherwise, it\'s a very useful app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crucial.
reviews.comment: This app works perfectly with 4.1 on my Galaxy Nexus and allows me to customize my pull-down choices on the notification bar just how I like them.  I use Tasker to create what I want to happen, then have Bar Shortcut fire-off the shortcut. I pick whatever icon I want it to be with tasker, and have a ton of control.    WISHES:      --Change background color (or remove color and just have an icon with text)  --More than one per row  --Separator bars
reviews.author: John Jacobs

reviews.comment: They are added top to bottom instead of small icons left to right. Takes up to much room on drop down. \"Launch From\" is better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for. Works VERY well with no problems. One of the best apps on my mobile. Well done!
reviews.author: James Sleigh

reviews.title: i love this app
reviews.comment: it very good app for me ,it easy to use and i love that this app have a shortcut to home for save my phone button when i want to go to home...i love this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where have you been in all my life??
reviews.comment: Been looking for something like this from day 1, since some widgets look ugly. This is a gem in the market. Surprised its not that well known.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: It does what it says it does. For free. At first the status bar icon that looks like and arrow w a plus in it will show up because it thinks there are too many notifications, but mine went away. It would be great if we could add more widgets, specifically the auto-rotate one. Other than that, this app is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too big
reviews.comment: Please use smaller icon and put it in table layout for more compact layout. I\'m expecting to have like 10 shortcuts. And please let us change the text color. My status bar is black color. I can\'t see the text.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update for galaxy note 2?
reviews.comment: This app repaces barcontrol for me but it has problem with keeping the shortcuts on the notification bar. Sometimes it would randomly remove a shortcut.
reviews.author: SenMDroid drater

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: A great way to keep the most frequently used up apps handy. Also a  great work around for when the launcher is sluggish and you need to get to your task killer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Wow this is the app I was looking for thanks to developer it would be more handy if we can use horizontal orientation of icons cheers

reviews.title: What an improvement!
reviews.comment: This has improved the ease of using my phone so much. No matter what I\'m doing, I can immediately open any of the shortcuts I have added to the dropdown list. (Optimus V)
